column6: SCORCHED EARTH PART 2 To save the world, Red Hulk needs the mightiest Avenger, and Thor has just the right tool for the job-the matchless Mjolnir! But when the God of Thunder's hammer drops, how much of Thor's wrath will fall on Red Hulk himself?
column8: | colorist:Bettie Breitweiser | penciller:Gabriel Hardman | writer:Jeff Parker
